title: WHOA! Yuvraj Singh drops a huge hint about Sagarika Ghatge and Zaheer Khan’s relationship
text:
WHOA! Yuvraj Singh drops a huge hint about Sagarika Ghatge and Zaheer Khan’s relationship Read the tweet posted by Yuvraj Singh for Zaheer Khan's alleged girlfriend Sagarika Ghatge. By Maggie Davis | Published: February 18, 2017 8:49 AM IST Comments Sagarika Ghatge, Zaheer Khan, Yuvraj Singh The rumours of ‘Irada’ actress Sagarika Ghatge dating Indian speedster Zaheer Khan has been in buzz since a long time. The duo grabbed eyeballs when they made a joint appearance at lovebirds Yuvraj Singh and Hazel Keech’s wedding reception in Goa. But even before that speculations about them were on. But when Indian team cricketer Rohit Sharma shared a message on the micro-blogging site Twitter, it was like one huge bomb that diverted all attention on Zaheer’s love life. Rohit had tweeted, “Brotherman down! Best wishes to my older brother @YUVSTRONG12 ! All eyes on @ImZaheer now” Oh yeah, all eyes are on him and his alleged girlfriend Sagarika. On February 16 Yuvi posted a tweet that has dropped another huge hint about Sagarika and Zaheer’s relationship. For several events Sagarika Ghatge and Zaheer Khan have been spotted together. The actress has even uploaded pictures of them together on her social media handle. But since the time talks about their hide-and-seek love story have been flashed in the media, she has not posted any pictures of her with Zaheer. But once again they were there for an event under one roof and it was while the special screening of ‘Irada’ where some Indian cricket team members, Hazel Keech with hubby Yuvraj Singh and others from film fraternity were also present. Even when the trailer of the film ‘Irada’ had released, Zaheer couldn’t stop singing praises for it on his social media handle. Take a look at some of the pictures below from the special screening: (ALSO READ: Is Sagarika Ghatge dating Zaheer Khan? Chak De actress finally spills the beans ) Now let’s take a look at the light-hearted conversation that happened between Yuraj Singh and Sagarika Ghatge on Twitter. Before the special screening of ‘Irada’, Yuvi tweeted ‘All the best @sagarikavghatge for tonight remember ufrom the days when u dated a v c of the Indian team good choice not do it in real life’. If you remember in the film ‘Chak De! India’ the hottie played the role of an Indian hockey player who was madly in love with Indian cricket team’s vice captain. Now Yuvi has related to that sequence, but we wonder in this epic banter if there’s any connection with Zaheer Khan as well.
